author: rhuijben
msg: Only add our option headers in the mod_dav_svn OPTIONS handler if the client
asks for our option(s). This avoids setting them over and over again if a
client asks for a list of options at once.
(get_option): Following up on r1557094, only add our option headers when
asked for our option; not for every (undefined) option.

msg: HAMA-839: Support NullWritable in Hama Pipes
